AUTHOR: Alzarath
DESCRIPTION:
Usage: [p]animu [text...] to search for and display information about an anime
Usage: [p]mango [text...] to search for and display information about a manga

Usage: [p]malset is used to set credential for MyAnimeList

Searches http://myanimelist.net/ for an anime or manga.
NAME: Searches for and posts information about anime and manga
